pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Beginning to Identify Areas of Value Creation</Introtext>
pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Beginning to Identify Areas of Value Creation
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">What do you ask Dr. Cardonza next?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A.You mentioned how your department was working on better understanding which treatment option(s) are better suited for patients with hyponatremia, as that will affect your status as a “top hospital.” What steps have you taken to work on this?
B.When you consider the treatment options available for hyponatremia, what alternatives do you consider?
C. Do you have a team or task force assigned to review the patient surveys?
D. What challenges stand in the way of making the right treatment decisions the first time around?
